title: React Pro T-Shirt
description: A comfortable and stylish t-shirt for every React developer. Made from 100% pure cotton with premium quality printing.

title: JavaScript Mug
description: Start your day with a dose of JavaScript. This ceramic mug is microwave and dishwasher safe with fade-resistant printing.

title: CSS Ninja Sticker Pack
description: A high-quality vinyl sticker pack for your laptop. Show off your CSS skills with these premium stickers.

title: Node.js Hoodie
description: Stay warm while coding with this premium Node.js hoodie. Perfect for late-night coding sessions with soft fleece lining.

title: Python Developer Notebook
description: A beautiful notebook for Python developers. Includes syntax highlighting examples, coding tips, and dotted grid pages.

title: Vue.js Cap
description: Show your Vue.js pride with this stylish cap. Adjustable fit and breathable material with embroidered logo.

title: TypeScript Keyboard
description: Mechanical keyboard designed for TypeScript developers. Cherry MX switches with custom keycaps and RGB lighting.

title: Angular Mouse Pad
description: Large gaming mouse pad with Angular logo. Smooth surface for precise mouse movements and durable construction.

title: Webpack Backpack
description: Spacious laptop backpack for developers. Multiple compartments, USB charging port, and water-resistant material.

title: GraphQL Water Bottle
description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle with GraphQL logo. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

title: Docker Desktop Stand
description: Adjustable laptop stand with Docker branding. Ergonomic design reduces neck strain and improves posture.

title: Next.js Wireless Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with Next.js branding. Active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.
